enhanced_description: Willis Towers Watson (WTW) is a global advisory and solutions firm established in 2016, specializing in data-driven, insight-led solutions across people, risk, and capital. Leveraging a global view and local expertise across 140 countries and markets, WTW helps organizations sharpen strategy, enhance organizational resilience, motivate their workforce, and maximize performance. Key areas of focus include designing effective employee benefits programs, providing expertise in pay equity and transparency, and implementing comprehensive cyber risk management strategies to mitigate people, capital, and technology risks.
